events.message: Customer reported a car collision involving their vehicle at a busy intersection on 2024-04-30 causing significant front-end damage.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial statement and police report submitted by the customer.
An insurance agent was assigned promptly to the case to ensure quick assistance and start the claims process efficiently.
The client received an acknowledgment confirming that their claim regarding the auto accident had been officially registered.
Requested detailed repair estimates, car registration, and driver's license copies to proceed with the evaluation of damages.
Customer successfully submitted all required documents including the mechanic’s damage report and photos of the vehicle.
Insurance investigator has begun assessing the validity of the claim and reviewing all submitted evidence related to the accident.
The investigation concluded with confirmation of claim legitimacy and was forwarded to the claims approval team.
A settlement offer covering repair costs and rental car reimbursement was proposed to the customer for review.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the quick response and fair proposed settlement for their vehicle damage.
The claim was approved by the claims manager, enabling the next steps of issuing payment and repairs authorization.
Payment for the approved settlement amount was issued directly to the auto repair shop as per customer’s request.
The claim was closed following full payment disbursement and confirmation that the vehicle repairs had been completed.
All case files regarding this automobile accident claim were archived in the system for future reference.
